text: Vanuatu has 18 constituencies (), which each elect different numbers of members to the unicameral Parliament of Vanuatu.https://electoral.gov.vu/awareness/constituency-and-polling- stationshttps://m.facebook.com/vanuatuelectoraloffice/posts/pfbid0HXTxU2aXao11fcvk31JHjUdvYhW291bPfQfoEfjT35iY43pMAFP3HL6E1BgrWAoXl?wtsid=rdr_0FU1os4v2YrFiCSq1 ==List of constituencies== Constituency Seats Voters (2022) Ambae 3 11,167 Ambrym 2 8,435 Banks 1 5,981 Efate Rural 5 46,888 Epi 2 6,807 Luganville 2 18,018 Maewo 1 3,438 Malekula 7 28,307 Malo/Aore 1 5,134 Paama 1 1,543 Pentecost 4 18,155 Port Vila 5 50,151 Santo 7 44,101 Shepherds 1 1,495 Tafea Outer Islands 1 4,613 Tanna 7 41,945 Tongoa 1 2,647 Torres 1 3,443 ==References== Vanuatu
title: Constituencies of Vanuatu
